div.p:
The environment in the Vidarbha region is not predictable for farming. Certainty of rainfall and appropriate environmental conditions are necessary for optimum plant growth and improved crop yields. In the conventional cultivation system, the farmer has to keep watch on proper rain & light intensity, which is different for different crops. The dearth of water and uncertainty in rainfall in the Vidarbha region are the prime reasons for low /no crops. This situation is persisting from year to year. The farmers take loans to get rid of this and could not pay in time. These are the reasons for their suicide under depression. If technology could assist in creating appropriate environmental conditions required for the crops, farmers will improve the crop yield and become economically strong. Hence the proposed project will
produce the ultimate solution for development & time- saving for the villagers and be less emergent too. To make
this drone our essentials/requirements are a DJI pro drone with a pre-installed mini camera in it the camera will be up to (3.2-20 MP) that it determines from analog to digital with various prices up (to 20-30k). A simple tank will be connected to the drone up to a 4-5 L Tank and its price max. goes up to (6-8k) determines by it’s company & remaining that are sprinklers, pipes & fillers varies approx (3-4k). An operator of this drone can easily cover up to 3 acres of land within just (15-20min). As well as the battery of the drone gets recharged within (30-40min). Hence the main advantage is that it reduces the wastage of fertilizers/water, and time & saves the farmers from some type of harmful pesticides too (low-risk exposure). It is embedded with obstacle radar which reduces the chances of accidents & damage.

div.div: Dipmala Kathale

div.h6: ST. Vincent Pallotti College Of Engineering & Technology,Gavsi Manapur, Wardha Road, Nagpur:441108
